passed away. I am his successor. I heard that

201247.「私たちは 夫婦で 賢者をしています。\n どうか あなたの行く先に 光がありま:

201248.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「若者よ。時間は:

201249.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「ルッチーは 私たち:
Lucchie has grown up to be a great girl without our knowledge. She may be the one to finally reach the gadabout that we could not
find.

201250.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「現役時代 やみくも:
During my working days, when I was playing hastily, I fell and hit my head on the Banana Peel of Abandoned Castle, and finally realized
the way of sage. The gadabout who died in Abandoned Castle was, in fact, me. That was a long time ago.

201312.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「私たちが 現役:
When we were active gadabouts, we used to play around the world and make all kinds of discoveries. Magic Ball was one of them, and
we also acquired an energizing powder called Energy Powder.

<pc> received Magic Ball (Key Item)
from Torchill!<me 60>

201314.花火の材料 まほうの玉を 手に入れた！\n岳都ガタラにいる花火交換屋に 渡しにい:

201315.<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>「なんだ ルッチ:
<attr><feel_think_lv2><end_attr>What is this, Lucchie's gadaboutcompanion?
What do you want from us?

201316.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr><icon_ex:
I want Magic Ball as a material for fireworks to lure Labor Demon Deathwork! Huh? What are you talking about? How valuable do you think
it is? Using it for fun is stupid! Oh, no. I was so surprised that I just spoke my mind. Hmm. That's good. If you think you can flush
out that elusive Death Work with the Magic Ball, then I'll let you have it.

201317.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「ムリをするなと言っ:

it easy. So tell Lucchie. Tell Lucchie to make
sure she defeats Deathwerk.

201318.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「まほうの玉は 私た:
The Magic Ball is a very valuable item that we received during our gadabout days. It would be a good thing to use it for fun, but if we are
going to use it to lure out the Death Work, then we have no choice. He won't listen to me even if I tell him not to be unreasonable. So,
please tell Lucchie. Tell Lucchie to make sure she defeats the Death Work.

201319.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「イマドキの遊び:
I used to think that Trendy Gadabout was a joke, but after seeing them, I changed my mind. I found infinite possibilities in
gadabout. I would like to watch Lucchie's life as a gadabout from now on.

201321.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「私が遊び人だっ:
Paisen is a repaired piece of ancient machinery that I found lying on the side of the road when I was a gadabout. I was
surprised to see that it still does gadabout. I was also surprised that the ancient counseling function is alive and well, and
that it has struck gadabout over time. You never know the cause and effect of things. But thank you for all you have done for me. Please
play with Lucchie and the others from now on. I am sure he will be joyful.

60425.<attr><feel_happy_one><end_attr>「んふふゥ。いい:

60426.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「あたいは サロ:

35254.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「花婿を鎮める慰霊碑:
